name: Frio3 - Parting and Meeting
description: A horror adventure game with a new twist that requires various actions.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo 2.8 / Athlon(TM) X2 3.0 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 7600 GT, Radeon 2600XT, Intel HD3000 Storage: 493 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Window7 Processor: Intel(R) i5 2.6 / AMD FX Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX650, Radeon HD7790 Storage: 493 MB available space
